longBusinessSummary: Santander UK plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking and financial products and services to personal, business, and corporate customers in the United Kingdom. It offers current accounts, credit cards, insurance, loans, mortgages, savings, investments to individuals. The company also provides current accounts, credit cards, savings, borrowings, financing, insurances, card payments, and other services to businesses. In addition, it offers treasury, trade, and financing services to corporates. Santander UK plc was formerly known as Abbey National Plc and changed its name to Santander UK plc in January 2010. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in London, United Kingdom. Santander UK plc operates as a subsidiary of Santander UK Group Holdings plc.
